TerritoryBuiltText: You have created a territory! Now other survivors cannot build within your area. There is a limit of %territorylimit% per player. You have built %territorycount%/%territorylimit% territories.
TerritoryLimitText: You have reached the territory limit! You currently own %territorycount%/%territorylimit% territories. Dismantle old territories to create new ones.
TerritoryDeletedText: You deleted %count% old territories. You can now build up to %territorylimit% new territories.
ObjectLimitText:
Cannot build! Territory contains %objectcount% total allowed base objects and %cargocount% cargo items.

This limit exists to maintain server performance.

Dismantle non-essential objects to continue building.
DismantleBlockedText: You cannot dismantle objects unless you are a territory member.
TooManyTerritoriesText: You have too many territories already! You can only build %territorycount% territories. Dismantle your old ones to make more.
MovedText: You previously disconnected inside someone else's territory. To prevent raid abuse, you have been moved to a new location outside of the territory.

AnyTerritoryBlacklist.MessageText: You can't place that %itemname% this close to another territory! You must move %distance% meters away.
AnyTerritoryBlacklist.BlockedActionText: You can't do that this close to another territory! You must move %distance% meters away.

ForeignTerritoryBlacklist.MessageText: You can't place that %itemname% this close to someone else's territory! You must move %distance% meters away.
ForeignTerritoryBlacklist.BlockedActionText: You can't do that this close to a territory you don't belong to! You must move %distance% meters away.

RequiresTerritoryBlacklist.MessageText: You require a territory to do that! Create a territory by using a combination lock on a fully built Territory Flag.
RequiresTerritoryBlacklist.BlockedActionText: You require a territory to do that! Create a territory by using a combination lock on a fully built Territory Flag.
